-  layerTopEdge 

Type Property# layerTopEdge

iOS 8.0+iPadOS 8.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.10+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+

```
static var layerTopEdge: CAEdgeAntialiasingMask { get }
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/quartzcore/caedgeantialiasingmask/layertopedge#Discussion)

Specifies that the top edge of the receiver’s content should be antialiased.
